title: Upgrade peer dependency to Nuxt UI 4
description:
Update peer dependency from @nuxt/ui ^3.0.0 to ^4.0.0.

Steps:
1. Update peerDependencies in package.json
2. Update playground to use Nuxt UI 4
3. Run pnpm install in playground
4. Verify playground starts

Test: pnpm run dev starts without errors
